data.title: 15 Questions about Cradle Of Filth | Music
data.meta_description: Youll have to REALLY know your filth on this one : - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author *L*)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. What is the name of Dani's first daughter?

Answer: Luna

Most people don't know that the lead vocalist even HAS a young daughter! :)

2. Fill in the missing word: "She was divinity's creature that kissed in cold ____ " ?

Answer: Mirrors

This lyric was taken from the song 'Her Ghost in the Fog', on Cradle of Filth's 6th album, 'Midian' (produced 2000 by Music For Nations).

3. What is the name of Cradle Of Filth's first fictional movie?

Answer: Cradle of Fear

'Cradle of Fear' stars Dani Filth, with the rest of the band appearing in grisly cameos. A must see gore movie for filthy fans!

4. In which year was the 'Vempire' album released?

Answer: 1996

Released on Cacophonus Records, 'Vempire' was Cradle of FIlth's second album.'

5. What was Dani's last name, at birth?

Answer: Davey

Dani, whose middle name is Lloyd, has vocal talents like no other, and has been with the band from their humble beginnings in 1991. (They did not release their first record until 1994.)

6. What instrument does Adrian Erlandsson play?

Answer: Drums

Adrian joined the band in 1999 shortly before the release of 'From the Cradle to Enslave.' He was approached by Cradle at the dynamo gig '99 where he played with 'The Haunted', and 2 weeks into June he was as filthy as could possibly be!

7. In the 2000 documentary called 'Living with the enemy' what are the names of the teenage Cradle fan, his sister & his mother?

Answer: Luke, Janet & Lyn

Luke's mother is disgusted by all the "horrible" posters t-shirts and Cradle of Filth music in her sons room. To find out whether Cradle of Filth really ARE involved in the "darker side of life," she gets to accompany them on their 'Cruelty and the Beast' European tour ... lucky lady! (although she doesn't think so!)

8. Gian Piras left the band in 2002?

Answer: True

After six years (1994-2002) as guitarist with Cradle Of Filth, Gian Piras announced he was leaving the band in September 2002.

9. On which album does 'Twisted nails of faith' first appear?

Answer: Cruelty and the Beast

'Cruelty and the beast' is Cradle of Filth's fourth album, which came out in 1998 by Music For Nations.

10. What is the name of the lovely lady who does CoF's female vocals when needed?

Answer: Sarah Jezebel Deva

Sarah Jezebel Deva was 16 when she had the fortune of meeting this very small band called 'Cradle of Filth' in 1993. Dani & Paul were the first people she met.

11. From which song is this line: "After descenturies have crawled, vilified our dark harkened day on spread wing now arrives' ?

Answer: Tearing the Veil From Grace

'Tearing the veil from grace' comes from CoF's 6th album 'Midian,' released in 2000 by Music For Nations.

12. Fill in the missing word: "Two thousand fattened years like maniacs have despoiled our common ____ " ?

Answer: grave

This line comes from the song "From the Cradle to Enslave" off the 'From the Cradle to Enslave" 1999 EP

13. What is the name of the official documentary which shows the making of 'From the Cradle to Enslave'?

Answer: Pandaemonaeon

'Pandaemonaeon' was made in 1999 by Alex Chandon & features 100 gallons of blood.

14. What is the name CoF's debut album?

Answer: The Prinicple of Evil Made Flesh

Since 1994's 'Principle of Evil made Flesh' CoF have changed members and record labels many times!

15. Which song played backwards is actually a recital of "The Lord's Prayer"?

Answer: Dinner at Deviants Palace

I found this interesting fact out through an 'easter egg' site. Apparently CoF hide little bits and peices in their albums for astute listeners from time to time :) Also, apparently reciting the lord's prayer backwards used to be used in ancient satanic rituals.

Source: Author *L*

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor gtho4 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
